feed.title: OpenCryptoBot
feed.subtitle: Home of OpenCryptoBot - the Swiss Army knife for crypto. Open source Telegram bot written in Python.

entry.title: Next Level 1.1.0
entry.content:
A new version of OpenCryptoBot is ready to be used! A lot of internal code changes happended over the last few months to make the bot more robust, structured and sane. But other than that, there are also a few new commands.

IMPORTANT: I’ve changed the order in which coin symbols have to be provided. For example, if you want to know the price of Bitcoin in Euro, you don’t write /p eur-btc anymore, but /p btc-eur!

New commands

/51 - PoW 51% attack cost
/de - Indicator for decentralization
/ev - List global crypto events
/man - Show how to use a command
/re - Send commands repeatedly
/tw - Get newest Tweets

Visit GitHub for the complete changelog
entry.summary: A new version of OpenCryptoBot is ready to be used! A lot of internal code changes happended over the last few months to make the bot more robust, structured and sane. But other than that, there are also a few new commands.

entry.title: Initial Release 0.1.0
entry.content:
Today is the day. After about two months in the making, i’m proud to release the first version 0.1.0 of OpenCryptoBot!

This initial release should already have the basic set of commands and run quite well. If you encounter any bugs or want some much needed features, let me know. I would really be glad if someone could thoroughly test the bot so that i can be sure that it doesn’t include any serious bugs.
entry.summary: Today is the day. After about two months in the making, i’m proud to release the first version 0.1.0 of OpenCryptoBot!
